name: Haircut & Restyle
description: This intricate service starts with a consultation, where you can discuss with our barber the new hairstyle you are looking for. This is followed by a haircut, blow dry and instructive styling with or without using hair products.

name: Clippers Only
description: This service will give you a choice of a buzz cut (single grade all over) or a classic short back and sides. Our trained barbers will use professional quality clippers to achieve a buzz cut or just trim the back and sides. This will not include scissor work.

name: Haircut
description: This will include a quick trim to keep your hair neat & tidy. With this service the barber will keep the same style and just trim the lengths. You can choose between a classic club cut (scissor over comb) or combine scissors and clippers to achieve your preferred style.

name: Beard Restyling
description: Give your beard the attention it requires. With beard restyling you can be sure that your illustrious beard & mustache will be trimmed, shaped and styled by our expert barbers with great precision. They will make sure that it suits your features and style perfectly.

name: Haircut/ Clippers & Beard Restyle
description: Combo offer: Haircut / Clippers & Beard Restyle.

name: Haircut/ Clippers & Luxury Shave
description: Combo offer: Haircut / Clippers & Luxury Shave.

name: Haircut & Restyle & Beard Restyle
description: Combo offer: Haircut & Restyle & Beard Restyle.

name: Haircut & Restyle & Classic Shave
description: Combo offer: Haircut & Restyle & Classic Shave.

name: Haircut & Restyle & Luxury Shave
description: Combo offer: Haircut & Restyle & Luxury Shave.

name: Classic Wet Shave
description: A Hot towel wet shave which includes application of shave foam followed by a cut-throat shave. Soothed with after-shave balm in the end.

name: Luxury Wet Shave
description: A classic wet shave which will be completed with luxury facial leaving your skin smooth & moisturized
